posts.title: Underwater!
posts.excerpt: Two scuba divers find a shipwreck which may contain undiscovered treasure, however, their attempt to salvage it is threatened by scavengers.

posts._title: Chuck Jones – The Bugs Bunny/Road-Runner Movie AKA The Great American Chase (1979)
posts.title: The Bugs Bunny/Road-Runner Movie
posts.excerpt: Quote:The Bugs Bunny/Road Runner Movie (originally titled The Great American Chase) is a 1979 Looney Tunes film with a compilation of classic Warner Bros. cartoon shorts and animated bridging sequences, hosted by Bugs Bunny. These cartoons, which also feature Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd, Porky Pig, Marvin the Martian, and Pepe le Pew, include (in order):

posts.title: The Mummy [+Commentary]
posts.excerpt: In 1921 a field expedition in Egypt discovers the mummy of ancient Egyptian prince Im-Ho-Tep, who was condemned and buried alive for sacrilege. Also found in the tomb is the Scroll of Thoth, which can bring the dead back to life. One night a young member of the expedition reads the Scroll out loud, and …

posts._title: Lina Wertmüller – Tutto a posto e niente in ordine AKA All Screwed Up (1974)
posts.title: Tutto a posto e niente in ordine
posts.excerpt: A group of immigrants from the south of Italy live collectively in the Milano’s suburbia in the 1974. Not only they share the house, but also hopes and troubles that in those years where part of the Italian society. Loves and fights among them are the mirror of the difficult environment in which the poor …

posts.title: The Mummy’s Hand
posts.excerpt: An ancient mummy is revived to destroy the invaders of the 3,000 year-old tomb of an Egyptian princess.

posts._title: Rodrigo Moreno – Un mundo misterioso AKA A Mysterious World (2011)
posts.title: Un mundo misterioso
posts.excerpt: Ana tells Boris, “I need time.” Boris is confused. Time? A period of separation? What does Ana mean? Does ‘time’ mean a week, a month, a year, or ten years? All at once, Boris is alone. Things are pretty tough for Boris whose problems begin the moment he tries to organise his everyday life. Boris …

posts._title: Azuma Morisaki – Ikiteru uchiga hana nanoyo shin-dara sore madeyo to sengen aka Nuclear Gypsies (1985)
posts.title: Ikiteru uchiga hana nanoyo shin-dara sore madeyo to sengen
posts.excerpt: Quote:(possible spoilers)Barbara, a dancer / stripper, traveling, going home to Nagoya after a long absence. She lives above the bar Nami no ue, in an area whose inhabitants are mainly from Okinawa. Upon her return, Barbara faces problems beyond his reach, his brother and two friends took one of their teachers hostage to extort money …

posts._title: Vladimír Morávek – Nuda v Brne AKA Bored in Brno AKA Boredom in Brno (2003)
posts.title: Nuda v Brne
posts.excerpt: Quote:A biting comedy concerning the lives of two young people who meet one day in a house in Brno in order to put their ideals of love into practice. A story about a couple not yet prepared for sexual life and a renowned actor no longer in his sexual prime.
posts.titleEnglish: Bored in Brno AKA Boredom in Brno

posts.title: Nora
posts.excerpt: letterboxd:The film is an adaptation of Henrik Ibsen’s play A Doll’s House. The film uses Ibsen’s alternate ending where the unhappy couple are reconciled at the end.

posts._title: Dario Argento – Non ho sonno AKA Sleepless [+ Commentary] (2001)
posts.title: Non ho sonno
posts.excerpt: An elderly and retired police detective and a young amateur sleuth team up to find a serial killer whom has resumed a killing spree in Turin, Italy after a 17-year hiatus.
